p: Spike (S) is the fundamental protein of the coronavirus, and forms a characteristic corolla structure on the membrane of the virion [ 55]. Structural integrity of spike and cleavage activation play a key role in virus invasion and virulence. Therefore, blocking coronavirus form entering host cell by targeting specific receptors on the host surface, such as S protein, might be therapeutic strategy of great value for the development of the anti-viral agents [ 56].
